wikipedia_page.main: Jonnie Woodall (25 January 1946 – 3 April 2009) was a British bobsledder and luger. He competed in the luge at the 1972 Winter Olympics and the bobsleigh at the 1980 Winter Olympics. He was killed by being hit by a train on a level crossing whilst out cycling.
